a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Affiliation of research teams building notable AI systems, by year of
Sector where the authors of an AI system have their primary affiliations.

g.text: Academia and industry collaborationAcademia and industry collaboration

text.tspan: Note: A research collective is a group of AI researchers not organized under an academic or industry affiliation. Systems are defined as
"notable" by the authors based on several criteria, such as advancing the state of the art or being of historical importance.
